author: flare(flare#0001)
install_msg: This cog subclasses core Mod and removed the core mute functionality and replaces it with a timed mute which uses roles. This cog is deprecated and no longer receiving updates. A future update to core will hopefully support timed mutes. (Purely hosted on this github under a different name for another cog I use has the name "mod")
name: MuteMod
description: Core mod with the inclusion of timed role mutes.
